# Greater Weapon Specialization (Feat)
## Overview
Choose one type of weapon (including unarmed strike or grapple) for which you possess the [[Weapon Specialization (Feat)|Weapon Specialization]] feat. Your attacks with the chosen weapon are more devastating than normal.

**Prerequisites**: Proficiency with selected weapon, [[Greater Weapon Focus (Feat)|Greater Weapon Focus]] with selected weapon, [[Weapon Focus (Feat)|Weapon Focus]] with selected weapon, [[Weapon Specialization (Feat)|Weapon Specialization]] with selected weapon, 12th-level fighter.

**Benefit**: You gain a +2 bonus on all damage rolls you make using the selected weapon. This bonus to damage stacks with other damage roll bonuses, including any you gain from [[Weapon Specialization (Feat)|Weapon Specialization]].

**Special**: You can gain Greater [[Weapon Specialization (Feat)|Weapon Specialization]] multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new type of weapon.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 126
